effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 642,311 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 261,689.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to lase your target for Precision Blasting, calling in Mister Lock-N-Stalk to deal 743,619 Physical damage to your target.
Use: Recalibrate for Mass Destruction. (20 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,731 to 9,450 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 286 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 924 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
